title: Android 10 update made the phone useless
content:
Impossible to click any links or google anything or use email. After updating to android 10 the phone became absolutely useless. Throws me out of everything. 
The only apps that more or less work are Instagram and a couple of texting apps. Thatâ€™s it. 
And I live in Russia so not like I can go and get help anywhere here.
Iâ€™ve rebooted my phone, reloaded, switched on and off, switched it to the safe mode, and still nothing improves.
